data.name: Street Fighter V - Capcom Pro Tour 2017 Premier Pass
data.detailed_description: Show your support for the Capcom Pro Tour with the Capcom Pro Tour 2017  Premier Pass. Includes the following content: Ryu CPT Costume, Ken CPT Costume, special daily targets, and special in-game titles "Capcom Cup 2017" and "Capcom Pro Tour 2017". This pass also includes the CPT Champions Choice costume and a new Capcom Pro Tour eSports stage, to be revealed at a later date. This special content will only be available for a limited time, so be sure to grab it before it's gone.
